item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: The Best Snipers (& Where To Find Them)
item.description:
Sniper Rifles can be a handy weapon to carry in Cyberpunk 2077 , and those who know where to look can find a total of 8 Iconic Sniper Rifles to add to their collection on V’s stash wall, and to use against some of the biggest threats in Night City and Dogtown. Snipers are a grand time thanks to their high Critical Hit damage, and they’re made even better thanks to a set of Iconic Modifiers.

The best Snipers in Cyberpunk 2077 will offer players a range of different abilities and modifiers that will truly separate them from other sets of weapons, and those who want to be the best sharpshooter in Night City will want to know what weapon to look for and where to find it.

If you can't find any of the Iconic Sniper Rifles found below, then visit Herold Lowe at the EBM Petrochem Stadium found in Dogtown (Phantom Liberty exclusive) to see if they're available for purchase here.

8 O’Five

Set Enemies on Fire with Explosive Bullets at the Cost of Movement

Type

Power

Attack Speed

0.4

Damage

612

Reload Speed

3

Effective Range

40

Weapon Handling

3.4

Magazine Size

3

Effects

+50% Armor Penetration

+50% Crit Damage

+40% Burn Chance

Significantly reduces movement speed and jump height

Provides sprinting, dodging, and dashing

Iconic Modifier

Set your enemies alight thanks to explosive-packed bullets. The more enemies burning at once, the faster you reload and the higher your Crit Chance.

  • How to Get O'Five: Located in Beat on the Brat: Arroyo, in Arroyo, Santo Domingo, players can increase the bet with Buck Arnold to €$18,000 so that he matches the bet with his Sniper Rifle. Win the fight and loot Buck to get O'Five.

O'Five is definitely a Power Sniper Rifle worth keeping an eye on due to its iconic modifiers that turn it into a railgun. While the weapon is fun thanks to its explosive bullets, it lacks the headshot multiplier of other snipers, and a faster reload from burning enemies doesn't excuse the fact that players are reduced to a slow walk when using this weapon. Regardless, it's easy enough to get early on due to players just needing to beat someone up for it. This Sniper benefits from long-range engagements where players can set enemies on fire without risk of their own demise, but the reduction to movement speed and the lack of damage make for a mediocre weapon.

7 Borzaya

A Burn-Dealing Crit-Loving Sniper with Great Damage and Poor Accuracy

Type

Power

Attack Speed

0.4

Damage

234

Reload Speed

3

Effective Range

69

Weapon Handling

3.4

Magazine Size

5

Effects

+200% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+50% Armor Penetration

+50% Burn Chance

Fires explosive rounds

Iconic Modifier

Grants a chance to inflict a unique burn on the enemy. Shooting an enemy affected by this burn always deals Crit Damage. The more enemies simultaneously affected by this burn, the more Crit Damage you deal, but at the cost of accuracy.

  • How to Get Borzaya: Found inside the Airdrop that lands in front of the Brave Atlas, located at the Golden Pacific in Dogtown. ( Phantom Liberty )

The Borzaya is rather impressive as both a canine and now as a Sniper Rifle. This variation has a high chance to inflict Burn on to enemies, and for enemies that are affected by Burn, they will always take Critical Hit damage to make sure every hit penetrates and stings more than the fire that scorches their bodies. This damage will extend depending on how many enemies are on fire and affected by Burn, but the cost of reduced accuracy will make decent distance fights a tad burdensome when trying to juggle all of these bonuses.

6 Sparky

Electrocute Enemies with Lethal Headshots

Type

Power

Attack Speed

0.4

Damage

275

Reload Speed

2.7

Effective Range

83

Weapon Handling

3.8

Magazine Size

4

Effects

+250% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+50% Armor Penetration

+30% Shock Chance

Iconic Modifier

Rounds fired from this weapon emit electric bolts on each headshots.

  • How to Get Sparky: Found within the cache during the Increased Criminal Activity: SCAVENGERS, unlocked by looting the key from the Arasaka drone. This encounter is found in ESC Explorer, Terra Cognita, Dogtown ( Phantom Liberty )

If players like to zap to the extreme, then they should look to the Sparky Sniper Rifle, as each headshot will apply Shock and electrify the enemies impacted. While there's nothing special about this weapon outside this modifier, it's still a fun time to blast at enemies and go zap-zap-zap. The magazine is short, the range is decent, and the reload speed is fairly lengthy, but electric bolts provided on each headshot ensure the wrath of Zeus is chambered in each shot.

5 Foxhound

The Faster You Move, the More Damage You Deal

Type

Tech

Attack Speed

1.8

Damage

173

Reload Speed

2

Effective Range

90

Weapon Handling

6.1

Magazine Size

3

Effects

+300% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+75% Armor Penetration

1 sec Charge Time

Can be charged from hip-fire

Iconic Modifier

Gain increased movement speed on kills and dismemberments. The faster you move, the more damage you deal. BARGHEST weapons also gain increased Armor Penetration.

Attachments

Scope

  • How to Get Foxhound: Random chance to be looted from Airdrops, or found in V's Stash if players used Amazon Prime Gaming between February 28, 2024, and April 3, 2024. ( Phantom Liberty )

For players who just can't seem to sit still, there's the Foxhound. This Sniper Rifle works great with the fast movement and gameplay of Cyberpunk 2077 , as long as players stay on the move, the more damage their weapon deals. To top it all off, movement speed is further increased on each kill and dismemberment, so it's truly a weapon that benefits from constantly moving feet and plenty of death. Being able to change the scope means that players don't have to stick to far distances, as they can use this as a Precision Rifle instead, shooting enemies and dismembering them for a movement boost, along with greater Armor Penetration.

4 NDI Osprey

An Explosive Hip-Firing Sniper

Type

Power

Attack Speed

2.9

Damage

121

Reload Speed

4

Effective Range

60

Weapon Handling

7.2

Magazine Size

12

Effects

+200% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+50% Armor Penetration

Slightly reduced movement speed

Full auto when fired from the hip

Iconic Modifier

Fires a powerful series of explosive rounds. Headshot increases damage from hip firing. Neutralizing multiple enemies increases reload speed and chance to apply Burning.

  • How to Get NDI Osprey: Found inside a weapon case in Alena Xenakis' safe house in Birds with Broken Wings, a Side Job found in The Moth, Arroyo, Coastview, Dogtown. ( Phantom Liberty )

If players want something more like a marksman rifle than a Sniper, then look to the NDI Osprey, an oversized Sniper that can be fired from the hip, with the added benefit of being fired in full auto. While movement speed may be reduced, the explosive rounds, headshot damage, and potential for fast reloads on a hip-firing death-providing monster are too good to ignore. This Sniper Rifle also has a great magazine size, and while the reload speed is pretty hefty, the headshot damage from the hip more than makes up for it, as does the Burning chance for added damage.

3 Rasetsu

Charged Rounds Can Bend Trajectory and Hit Multiple Enemies

Type

Tech

Attack Speed

0.8

Damage

221

Reload Speed

3.6

Effective Range

90

Weapon Handling

4.5

Magazine Size

3

Effects

+300% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+50% Armor Penetration

1.5 sec Charge Time

Cannot penetrate cover

Iconic Modifier

Charged rounds now penetrate through enemies and will bend their trajectory to hit multiple enemies simultaneously.

  • How to Get Rasetsu: Automatically acquired during the Main Mission in Phantom Liberty 's campaign, You Know My Name

Players might have heard of Air Benders, but have they heard of bullet benders? Rasetsu is an oddity, providing an Iconic Tech Sniper Rifle that can have charged shots penetrate through enemies to bend and hit multiple enemies at once. It's a railgun that has a violent punch to it, with extremely noticeable headshot damage. The only draw back is the limited magazine size and lengthy reload, but the damage multiplier from headshots makes this gun so powerful.

2 Overwatch

Built-in Silencer and Increased Reload Speed

Type

Power

Attack Speed

0.4

Damage

193

Reload Speed

2.6

Effective Range

90

Weapon Handling

4.5

Magazine Size

5

Effects

+300% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+50% Armor Penetration

Iconic Modifier

Increases reload speed. Comes with a custom silencer.

  • How to Get Overwatch: Rewarded to V by Panam Palmer for completing Riders on the Storm, Panam's questline that can be started after the Life During Wartime Main Job

An absolute classic from the popular Panam Palmer, Overwatch is a Sniper Rifle worth keeping around for a few reasons. Not only is it the essential Sniper for stealth thanks to its custom silencer, but its faster reload speed makes its bolt-action firing feel a tad better, and the headshot damage multiplier is nothing to laugh at. A decent magazine size, headshot damage, and reload speed make this Sniper Rifle great for long-range engagements, especially with a silencer to ensure stealth playthroughs stay quiet.

1 Breakthrough

A Sniper Rifle That Can Shoot Through Walls

Type

Tech

Attack Speed

1.7

Damage

151

Reload Speed

2

Effective Range

90

Weapon Handling

5.7

Magazine Size

4

Effects

+300% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+100% Armor Penetration

1.25 sec Charge Time

Can be charged from hip-fire

Iconic Modifier

Allows rounds to penetrate through walls without being charged, after which they can ricochet multiple times.

  • How to Get Breakthrough: Crafted from the Crafting Spec obtained from Olga Elisabeth Longmead at the Suspected Organized Crime Activity: New, Boss, New Rules, located at Carnitas Street, Rancho Coronado, Santo Domingo

There's nothing worse than a cowering enemy seeking cover against the might of a Sniper Rifle. Luckily, this Sniper doesn't accept the rules when it comes to cover, and will happily charge up to fire a wall-piercing shot. Penetrating through cover and allowing said charged shots to ricochet will provide a battlefield of death for all but V, especially with such high damage numbers for headshots.

118
9.0 /10

item.title: 8 Open-World Games With 90+ Scores On Open-Critic
item.description:
Review scores, in the grand scheme of things, don’t matter a whole lot. If a game is good, or even if it fascinates one player, then it is valid. Deadly Premonition is a solid example of a game that received middling to bad reviews on review aggregates like OpenCritic and Metacritic, yet it has a loyal fan base and has earned cult-classic status .

That’s an example of an open-world game , but there are plenty of games within that genre that have graced the coveted 90+ review score realm on OpenCritic . Numbers, again, shouldn’t mean everything, as players should know more about a game before jumping in than just its review score. That said, players can at least rest assured that these games are beloved by a larger group of gamers, which means they will probably like them too.

Death Stranding 2: On The Beach

Deliver It Your Way

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
22
9.0 /10
Released
June 26, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Violence, Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Strong Language
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 90

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is a better game than its predecessor from a gameplay perspective. Players are given more ways to deliver their packages, and more tools to aid in traversal and combat, and it feels good connecting with other players through the game's asynchronous multiplayer.

Players can build roads to drive on, restore and ride railway systems, surf on a coffin, and the list goes on. Death Stranding 2 can still be brutal at times, but the quality of life additions are great, and it’s still a full-blown Hideo Kojima game with all the expected wacky fixings in the story.

Donkey Kong Bananza

A Destructible Open-World

Donkey Kong Bananza
19
9.3 /10
Released
July 17, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Everyone 10+ // Fantasy Violence
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 91

Donkey Kong Bananza is unlike every other Donkey Kong game that came before it, and that’s a good thing. No game has demonstrated DK’s strength this well, even in fighting games like Super Smash Bros.

Donkey Kong's ability to smash through stone is unprecedented, and every biome within the game is almost fully destructible. As fun as it is to play, it’s also a cute little adventure featuring DK and Pauline, who share a dream and get into plenty of antics along the way.

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth

Reborn And Ready For Action

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth
9 /10
47
9.2 /10
Released
February 29, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Violence
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 92

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is quite possibly the best Final Fantasy game of the past decade, perhaps even since the PS2 era. Even though it’s only the second part of a three-part story, it features an open world that fully recreates and enhances what previously only existed as simple polygons on the PS1.

The Junon area in particular is a fun one to explore, thanks to the battlefield ruins and the giant sunken pirate ship found within. The story is equal parts cool, dramatic, and funny, the gameplay is action-packed, and there are plenty of mini-games that fans have missed for ages in Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth .

Grand Theft Auto 5

Steal Your Way Through Los Santos

Grand Theft Auto 5
9 /10
151
8.9 /10
Released
September 17, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 92

Grand Theft Auto 5 rocked the world of many fans when it launched in 2013, and players are still engaged with it thanks to the stellar online multiplayer mode, Grand Theft Auto Online . It was Rockstar’s biggest world at the time, as players could do and see more than in any other entry in the series.

They could drive cars in the city or countryside, fly planes or helicopters, or even swim underwater. The biggest gameplay gimmick allowed players to swap between the three core characters at any time. They all played the same except for one character-specific special ability, but their personalities were quite different.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

Monster Hunter (And Tracker)

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
55
9.5 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 93

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt wrapped up the original Geralt trilogy with a bang. The world was fully open, and Geralt controlled much better than in previous entries, between his sword fighting and magic usage.

The world was vast, perhaps even daunting to some players, and there was danger around every corner. The quest system and overall character interactions are what players took away from this game the most, which elevated RPGs to a new level.

Elden Ring

The Fields Of Horror

Elden Ring
10 /10
69
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 95

Many Soulslikes have come for the crown of FromSoftware, and some genuinely good ones followed games like Demon’s Souls and Dark Souls . However, Elden Ring is a whole new ballgame. It takes the genre into the open-world realm and gives players the freedom to tackle objectives in any order they choose.

There are a few caveats to progression in the game, but for the most part, players can explore and fight as they please. The coolest part of exploration is the horse, Torrent, who can double jump, something that is not a typical horse trait in games. So, what will be the first true open-world Soulslike to follow Elden Ring , and will it become as beloved?

Red Dead Redemption 2

Explore The Old West

Red Dead Redemption 2
10 /10
172
9.5 /10
Released
October 26, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 95

Grand Theft Auto 5 , and the series as a whole, may have a larger fanbase, but Red Dead Redemption 2 is Rockstar’s crowning achievement. For a game about cowboys, criminals, and the old West, Rockstar managed to pull on the heartstrings of players through tough narrative choices and strong character development.

The story isn't the only beautiful thing about this Rockstar game; their recreation of the Old West and the lush forests of the South is truly remarkable. Whether players engage with it linearly or treat it as a cowboy simulator, Red Dead Redemption 2 will not let fans down.

The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild

Nintendo Did It Best

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
10 /10
48
9.2 /10
Released
March 3, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone: Fantasy Violence, Use of Alcohol, Mild Suggestive Themes
Powered by
  • OpenCritic Score : 96

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is not just considered a great open-world game; according to OpenCritic, it is one of the top three best games of all time, and it ranks highly on other aggregate sites, too. It redefines what an open-world game can be thanks to Link's gliding and climbing abilities. Hyrule is more dangerous than ever before, as players can die easily if they explore too far in a certain area.

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom , its direct sequel, is a bigger game with more gameplay mechanics to tinker with, but there’s something pure about Breath of the Wild . As a Switch launch game, this was THE game that everyone had to buy, and it remains infinitely replayable almost a decade later.

item.title: How to Use The Sims 4 Relationship Cheats
item.description:
In The Sims 4 , the main focus is providing a taste of authentic living, and that's why relationships take the spotlight. Forming connections, be they friendship or romances, is an important part of gameplay. Players will constantly have to work to build their Sims’ relationships with fellow Sims in the game.

Whether a player wants to advance skills, gain an advantage, or minimize the legwork involved, cheats can be game changers. Considering the fact that building relationships in The Sims 4 demands a lot of effort and time, cheats can come in handy. This guide will walk players through the relationship cheats and how to use them.

Updated on September 16, 2025, by Ashely Claudino: While official cheats that players type down on the command console to activate can be useful when it comes to cheating relationships in The Sims 4, mods can be an even more practical way to cheat Sims' relationships. This guide has been updated and now contains information on two useful mods that players can use to easily modify their Sims' relationships.

The Sims 4 Relationship Cheat Codes

Various cheats can be used to manage relationships in The Sims 4 . These cheats allow players to adjust friendship levels according to their desires. They not only change the friendship level but also foster romance between Sims. The table below showcases The Sims 4 relationship cheats.

Cheat Code

Role

ModifyRelationship Sim1 Sim2 100 LTR_Friendship_Main

Boost friendship between two Sims

ModifyRelationship Sim1 Sim2 -100 LTR_Friendship_Main

Decrease friendship between two Sims

Relationship ModifyRelationship Sim1 Sim2 100 LTR_Romance_Main

Boost romantic relationship between two Sims

Relationship ModifyRelationship Sim1 Sim2 -100 LTR_Romance_Main

Weaken romantic relationship between two Sims

ModifyRelationship SimName PetName 100 LTR_SimtoPet_Friendship_Main

Strengthen friendship between a Sim and a Pet

ModifyRelationship SimName PetName -100 LTR_SimtoPet_Friendship_Main

Weaken friendship between a Sim and a Pet

relationship.introduce_sim_to_all_others

Form connection with all Sims

relationships.create_friends_for_sim

Initiate a new friendship with a Sim at 50 percent

Players who own the Lovestruck expansion pack can also improve their Romance Skill level to easily seduce and win over other Sim. To cheat the romance skill to max level, gamers have to input Stats.Set_Skill_Level Major_Romance 10 in the cheat console.

How to Cheat Relationships Sims 4

Before using any cheats, players must enable cheats. Luckily, the process is straightforward, though it varies slightly depending on the player's device.

  • Windows: Press CTRL + SHIFT + C
  • Mac: Press Command + Shift + C
  • Console: Press all four bumper buttons simultaneously

Now, type “testingcheats on” in the cheat box to enable the cheats in The Sims 4 . With cheats enabled, copy any cheat from the table mentioned above and paste it into the cheat console and forge connections with others that will stand the test of time.

To use it on specific Sims, change the "Sim 1" and "Sim 2" with the Sims' first and last names - the same goes for cheats that target pets.

How to Cheat Relationships in The Sims 4 Using Mods

There are two mods in The Sims 4 that simplify most cheats to the point that it is incredibly tempting to use them whenever players have them installed; the mods are UI Cheats Extensions and MC Command Center.

How to Cheat Sim Relationships Using UI Cheats Extension

  • UI Cheats Extension mod

UI Cheats Extension is one of the most straightforward mods that exists for The Sims 4 , and that is why it is among the first mods that players get for the game. Players can easily modify certain aspects of their game simply by clicking on something and modifying it. This is great for changing Sim's current needs from low to high or vice-versa, removing certain moodlets and modifying relationships.

To cheat Sims' relationships with UI Cheats, players have to open the Relationship panel, click on a Sim with the right mouse button, and then edit the relationship however they want . They can delete the relationship entirely, remove the romance bar, or set a value to determine the Sim's relationship with their Sim. If players write 0, the Sims will only be acquainted and experience a neutral romantic relationship. However, gamers can set a positive or negative romantic and friendly relationship by setting values between -100 and 100.

How to Cheat Sim Relationships Using MC Command Center

  • MC Command Center

MC Command Center is a much more complex mod compared to UI Cheats Extension. So, while it can take a little more getting used to, it allows players to modify deeper aspects of Sim relationships. The Relationships options that come with MCCC make it easy for players to set relationships with all sorts of Sims, even those that they've never encountered; they can easily forget their currently active relationships, and even begin an active romantic or friendly relationship with everyone on the lot. It can get hectic, but it's a lot of fun.

To access Relationships, players must select a Sim, select the MC Command Center option in the pie menu, and then scroll down to the Relationships tab.

The standard MCCC mod is enough to make it possible for players to alter the relationships between Sims, but they can take it up a notch with the MC Woohoo extension for the mod, which can be obtained and installed separately. With MC Woohoo, players can change various settings related to WooHoo in The Sims 4 , such as options regarding nudity, sleeping in the same bed, and much more.

The Sims 4

8.2 /10

item.title: New Game Turns Naruto’s Talk no Jutsu Into a Main Gameplay Mechanic
item.description:
It's not exactly novel to point out that one of the indie scene's most valuable assets is its ingenuity. Groundbreaking games like Who's Lila , The Alters , and Mouthwashing would likely never have been made if not for the unfettered creativity of indie developers, whose ideas are often a bit too outlandish or intimidating to AAA money-movers. Upcoming indie Harmony of Aetheria is looking to continue this trend of creative excellence through a thoughtful touch of Talk no Jutsu, as it were.

Talk no Jutsu (Art of Talking) is a concept coined by Naruto creator Masashi Kishimoto, and references the trope of a character using nothing more than speech to alter the behavior of their opponent. In other words, it's a fancy anime term for trash-talking, something that the likes of Naruto are more than familiar with. On the one hand, formalizing such a genre staple can be seen as a bit silly, or as little more than a nod to the audience, but there's a case to be made that Talk no Jutsu is more than that. Words are a form of magic, known to anger, inspire, amuse, or terrify their targets. This is what Harmony of Aetheria is attempting to channel, as seen in a recently revealed gameplay showcase.

Harmony of Aetheria Aims to Make Dialogue a Key Part of Combat

The Pen Is as Mighty as the Sword in Harmony of Aetheria

In a post shared by developer Chill Dragon Games on Reddit, the dialogue mechanics of Harmony of Aetheria are described as being like " Mass Effect , but you actually talk to enemies during combat." Harmony of Aetheria 's gameplay trailer demonstrates how this works in practice: the game plays out like a traditional third-person action brawler, but the player can hurl insults, threats, logic, and more at their enemies in the midst of fights. Depending on a number of factors, these dialogue exchanges can enrage, assuage, or intimidate the enemy. Any of these outcomes can change the course of a given battle, so says Chill Dragon Games.

Based on the Reddit thread in question, Chill Dragon Games appears to be a solo developer.

The mechanics of this dialogue system are only briefly expounded upon in the Reddit post and ensuing comments, but Chill Dragon Games paints a promising picture. For example, the developer noted that a boss's Rage meter, pictured in the trailer, can be filled as a result of hurling insults and other unsavory comments, and that upon filling this meter, the boss will transform into a "fire golem." The fire golem poses a greater threat, but will also yield a greater reward upon defeat.

This example encounter gestures toward great ambitions for the dialogue system, as it could theoretically deepen gameplay through complex risk-reward mechanics, relative to a given boss or enemy. Chill Dragon Games has noted that this feature is very much a work in progress and that there are plans to add voice acting and other improvements.

Though Humble, Harmony of Aetheria Could Break New Ground

Chill Dragon Games is far from an established studio and, as previously mentioned, it appears to be either a one-person operation or a small team. But if the past few years have taught gamers anything, it's to not underestimate humble beginnings. Stardew Valley and Undertale are both solo projects, and worldwide phenomena like the impossibly successful Hollow Knight games have come from similarly lean studios.

If done right, Harmony of Aetheria 's dialogue-infused combat could be something truly unique. Combat and dialogue options are two of the oldest video game design tropes around, so it only makes sense to try to fuse them. Here's hoping Chill Dragon Games sticks the landing.

61
9.7 /10

Naruto

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: The Best Shotguns (& Where to Find Them)
item.description:
There’s nothing better than running around Night City with a boomstick and engaging in the thrills of bloody violence that only a Shotgun in Cyberpunk 2077 can be capable of. Luckily for players, there are 11 Iconic Shotguns in Cyberpunk 2077 that players can find and make excellent use of to create a furious playstyle where they are able to navigate gunfire to one-shot most enemies that dare test V’s legendary status as a merc.

With the best Shotguns in Cyberpunk 2077 within reach, players will need to know everything they can about the selection of Shotguns before them so that they can carry the most superior of them all into battle and make sure that V and Johnny never back down.

If you can't find the weapons mentioned below, then check in with Herold Lowe at the EBM Petrochem Stadium found in Dogtown (Phantom Liberty exclusive) to see if you can purchase them.

11 Alabai

An Ultra-Violent Shotgun That Shoots Fast, As Heavy as a Tank

Type

Power

Attack Speed

4.0

Damage

123

Reload Speed

1.7

Effective Range

9

Weapon Handling

4.5

Magazine Size

15

Effects

+85% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+25% Armor Penetration

+10% Burn Chance

10 Number of projectiles

Iconic Modifiers

Grants a chance to inflict a unique burn on the enemy. Shooting an enemy affected by this burn always deals Crit Damage. The more enemies simultaneously affected by this burn, the more Crit Damage you deal, but at the cost of accuracy.

  • How to Get Alabai: Looted from an Airdrop found near the Brave Atlas in Longshore Stacks, Dogtown. ( Phantom Liberty )

The Alabai Shotgun is all about providing V with a city to burn, as this weapon has a unique burn effect that will have those impacted take extra Crit Damage. Due to the burn, more Crit Damage isn't going to do all that much, and the fact that players lose accuracy with each enemy burning doesn't warrant using this. The low Headshot Damage Multiplier also doesn't promise much power, and status effect damage isn't something that V can build much into when it comes to creating the perfect build.

10 Bloody Maria

A Shotgun Which Increases Reload Speed with Dismemberment

Type

Power

Attack Speed

1.2

Damage

309

Reload Speed

0.4

Effective Range

12

Weapon Handling

3.3

Magazine Size

8

Effects

+85% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+25% Armor Penetration

+30% Bleeding Chance

6 Number of projectiles

Iconic Modifiers

Increases knockdown, bleeding, and dismemberment chance. Enemies deprived of their limbs increase your reload speed and Crit Chance.

  • How to Get Bloody Maria: A reward for completing all of Muamar Reyes' Gigs.

Bloody Maria has a moderately successful Iconic Modifier that only makes it slightly better than just the standard set of Shotguns. Bloody Maria's increased chance to commit to knockdown, bleeding, and dismemberment makes for a nice weapon indeed, but destroying limbs just to reload faster doesn't do all that much. Not only will players have to complete all of Muamar Reyes' Gigs to get this gun, but they will be rewarded with a weapon that's mediocre. Decent projectiles and a decent chance for status effects are nice, but it's just not as powerful as it could be.

9 Mox

Increased Shock and Knockdown Chance When Enemies are Close

Type

Power

Attack Speed

0.9

Damage

320

Reload Speed

0.6

Effective Range

12

Weapon Handling

5.5

Magazine Size

8

Effects

+85% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+25% Armor Penetration

6 Number of projectiles

Improves accuracy by changing irregular pellet spread into a more uniform, predictable pattern

Iconic Modifiers

Judy's mods give this shotgun extra lightness and precision. When enemies get close, your Shock and Knockdown chance is increased.

  • How to Get Mox: Found in Judy's Apartment in Kabuki, Watson, after completing Judy's final mission, Pyramid Song.

Completing Judy's questline rewards players with a shotgun that she has personally tinkered with to boost its performance. The Mox is deserving of deadly hands, and it's great for defensive playstyles or for players who want to get up close and get their hands dirty. This Shotgun has an absolutely rapid reload speed, and even better is the fact that being close to enemies rewards an increased chance to Shock and Knockdown, meaning you're always going to have enemies zapped and struggling to stand just by pounding them with pellets.

8 Sovereign

Point Blank Shots Increase Movement and Reload Speeds

Type

Power Double-Barrel

Attack Speed

5

Damage

209

Reload Speed

1

Effective Range

8

Weapon Handling

2.7

Magazine Size

2

Effects

+85% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+75% Armor Penetration

+6% Burn Chance

6 Number of projectiles

Iconic Modifiers

Guaranteed Crit Hits with point-blank shots. Increased reload speed and movement speed after shooting an enemy in the torso.

  • How to Get Sovereign: Crafted from the Crafting Spec acquired from Shinobu Amai at the Suspected Organized Crime Activity: Modern Labor Market, located in Willow Street, Japantown, Westbrook.

There's something truly intimate about this shotgun, which only has 2 bullets chambered before players need to reload. It's a classic boomstick, and one that's complemented by its high damage and fast reload speed. Players won't just see joy from its classic design, as the Iconic Modifier really helps with players who enjoy point-blank guns such as this. This double-barreled shotgun rewards players who get far too close to their opponents with guaranteed Crit Hits at point-blank range, along with a further increase to reload speed and movement speed for shooting enemies in the torso. This means aim for the torso, see more damage, and run around like a cyberpsycho, ready and reloaded to shoot some more.

7 The Headsman

A Single-Round Shotgun That Behaves Like a Rail Gun

Type

Power

Attack Speed

1.2

Damage

194

Reload Speed

0.4

Effective Range

26

Weapon Handling

5.6

Magazine Size

6

Effects

+200% Headshot Damage Multiplier

+25% Armor Penetration

+50% Crit Damage

1 Number of projectiles

Iconic Modifiers

Fires a single round instead of pellets. Coupled with a unique scope, this shotgun gains ridiculous accuracy for its range. Headshots momentarily increase reload speed and accuracy and a subsequent headshot deals Crit Damage.

  • How to Get The Headsman: Crafted from the Crafting Spec dropped by the Militech Minotaur, found at the Suspected Organized Crime Activity: Privacy Policy Violation in Impala Automatics, North Oak, Westbrook

If players are looking for a Shotgun that can be fired over decent distance, then try out the Headsman. This is for ranged play, as it fires a single slug per shot, with 6 shots per magazine. There's no knockback for this gun, as it's more reliant on precision, but that precision can be rewarded with its quality accuracy and headshot damage that provides faster reload speed and additional accuracy, and each headshot deals Crit Damage to really make this weapon pop. However, this is something players should only use if they like range and don't want to hug their enemies with death from close range.

6 Ba Xing Chong

A Shotgun That Behaves as a Rocket Launcher

Type

Smart

Attack Speed

2

Damage

1041

Reload Speed

2.3

30

Weapon Handling

4

Effects

+50% Armor Penetration

1.2 sec Lock-on time

4 Number of projectiles

Slightly reduces movement speed and jump height

Iconic Modifiers

A rocket launcher that fires explosive rounds. This weapon can smart-target up to six enemies simultaneously. Everything caught in the blast radius is torn to shreds. Be careful - that goes for you too. At low Health, reload speed and Burn chance is increased.

  • How to Get Ba Xing Chong: Found inside Adam Smasher's secret room at the Ebunike Docks, Northside, Watson, after defeating Adam Smasher and looting his Access Token in the final mission.

If players want a Rocket Launcher in Cyberpunk 2077 , then they should try out the Ba Xing Chong, a Shotgun that behaves more like an explosive weapon than something with some buckshot. Ba Xing Chong is utterly lethal, but that comes at the cost of players also being within the firing line thanks to explosive splash damage. Even so, low health rewards players with faster reload speed and a Burn chance so that enemies are always going to be on an inferior playing field.

Charging this weapon above 66% vaporizes any enemies in your path, leaving an EMP trail behind it.

  • How to Get Order: Purchased from Herold Lowe in the EBP Petrochem Stadium in Dogtown ( Phantom Liberty )

While some players might not want to charge shotguns, it means extra damage to perform what one would expect from a brutal railgun. Order benefits from its charged fire mode, as it will deal extended damage to those impacted by its blast for more damage in its double-barrel design.

4 Dezerter

More Movement Speed and Damage Mitigation When Set on Fire

Type

Power Double-Barrel

Attack Speed

15 Number of projectiles

Iconic Modifiers

Neutralizing an enemy engulfs you in flames except when your Health is low, granting a movement speed boost and increases Mitigation Chance.

  • How to Get Dezerter: Looted from Leon Rinder's Garage, accessible during Addicted To Chaos, a Side Job found in Terra Cognita, Dogtown. ( Phantom Liberty )

Dezerter is a weapon that truly benefits from the right build due to its collaboration with being set on fire. With the right Mitigation perks, players can almost entirely avoid taking damage while they're on fire, quite literally showcasing how hot they are inthe midst of battle. Each kill with this Shotgun sets you on fire, and that increases your speed and Mitigation Chance so you can run faster than a speeding bullet and ignore the damage from enemies while you burn alive.

3 Amstaff

An Ultra-Violent Shotgun That Shoots Fast, As Heavy as a Tank

Iconic Modifiers

Gain increased movement speed on kills and dismemberment. The faster you move, the more damage you deal. BARGHEST weapons also gain increased Armor Penetration

Attachments

Scope

  • How to Get Amstaff: Random chance to be looted from an Airdrop in Dogtown, or added to V's Stash with Amazon Prime Gaming from November 29, 2023, to December 27, 2023 ( Phantom Liberty )

BARGHEST weapons all act rather similarly, and Amstaff joins the list by providing increased movement speed to kills and dismemberment, and increased damage based on movement speed. It's a weapon that works great for those who love to keep on the move and like to stay fast and agile. With decent projectiles, speedy reload, and magazine size, the Amstaff has a decent level of spice for players who want to increase the fluidity of their kills, but only if they have Phantom Liberty .

Mod

  • How to Get Pozhar x-MOD2: Found within a secret room in Elizabeth Kress Street, Longshore Stacks, Dogtown, at 1 AM in-game. ( Phantom Liberty )

Pozhar X-MOD2 is extremely reliable thanks to how well-designed this weapon is in terms of ammo count and fire rate, and it's made even better with the attachments that players can use. This weapon is fast to reload, has plenty of ammo in the magazine, and has decent accuracy thanks to its x-MOD2 design. While there's no base Iconic Modifier, it does come with 2 Mods that players can use to make it even better, improving its stats to make it devastating and utterly lethal to dominate every battle you enter.
